meanings.definition: A district or administrative division in certain countries, especially in India.
meanings.sent1: The local government divided the region into smaller zillahs for better management.
meanings.sent2: The zillahs in India are similar to counties in other countries.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly claimed to be the queen of the zillahs at the school fair.
meanings.sent4: The zillahs acted as puzzle pieces, fitting together to form the entire administrative map.
meanings.sent5: The colorful zillahs on the map made it easy to distinguish one area from another.
